column3: News;Kampong Thom:------ A drunk man walking home fell down a wells and died a horrible death.------The incident took place at 7:20 pm on 10 January 2019 in Poung Village
column6: Kampong Thom Province.------The victim was identified as Khaek Khoeun
column9: the police managed to retrieve the body examined and concluded the victim had drowned.------They then handed over the victim’s body to the family for the traditional festivals.------ ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/403660
